weekday_morning_mon_thu: This morning, what is one thing I want to feel by tonight, and what is one small action that would make that feeling more likely?
If one thing derails my focus today, it will probably be ___. If that happens, then I will respond by ___.
What is one strength I want to practice using today on purpose?
What is one thing I am quietly looking forward to today, and how can I savor it more?
What would a "good enough" day look like today, realistically?
friday_morning: Looking back at this week so far, what am I most proud of, and how can I carry that energy into today?
If I start to mentally check out today, then I will gently bring myself back by ___?
What is one unfinished task I can close today to gift my future self a lighter Monday?
How do I want to feel going into the weekend, and what is one boundary I can set today to protect that feeling?
What is one small way I can celebrate surviving this week?
weekend_morning: What kind of weekend do I need more right now: restorative, adventurous, or productive? Why?
If I catch myself mindlessly scrolling today, then I will switch to ___ instead.
What is one tiny thing I could do today that my body will thank me for?
Who is one person I would genuinely enjoy connecting with this weekend, and how could I reach out?
What would make this weekend feel meaningful rather than just "filled"?
midday_checkin: Compared to this morning, what has shifted in my energy, and what might be the reason?
If the rest of today goes exactly like the last 3 hours, how will I feel tonight? What is one small tweak I want to make?
What is one thing I can let go of or deprioritize this afternoon without the world falling apart?
What is one thing that has gone better than expected so far today?
If I hit a wall in the next few hours, then my reset routine will be ___, ___, and ___.
weekday_evening_mon_thu: What moment from today do I want to remember a week from now, and why?
Where did I act in alignment with my values today, even in a tiny way?
Where did I feel out of alignment today, and how can I gently course correct tomorrow?
If I could replay one uncomfortable moment from today, what would I do differently, and what can I learn instead of just cringing?
What is one thing I can thank my past self for doing that helped me today?
friday_evening: What were three real wins from this week, no matter how small?
What was the hardest moment of this week, and what does it reveal about what I care about?
If next week repeated this week exactly, what would I be happy about, and what would I want to change?
How can I symbolically close this week tonight, so that my brain understands it is allowed to rest?
What am I quietly grateful for right now that I rarely acknowledge?
saturday_evening: What actually felt nourishing about today, and what just kept me busy?
If tomorrow were completely unscheduled, what would I naturally drift toward doing, and what does that say about my current needs?
Did anything today surprise me in a good way? What does that surprise tell me about what I have been expecting lately?
What is one thing I regret about today, and how can I turn that regret into a specific do differently tomorrow?
What feeling am I ending today with, and what might that feeling be trying to tell me?
sunday_evening_reset: What do I need from the upcoming week emotionally, not just in terms of tasks?
What am I carrying into this new week that I would like to set down, even mentally, for now?
What are my top three non negotiables for this week, and why do they actually matter to me?
If this week turns out to be stressful, what is my if then plan to protect my wellbeing?
In seven days, what would I love to be able to write here about how this week went?
month_beginning: Looking back at last month, what patterns do I notice in my mood or energy?
What is one story about myself from last month that I want to keep, and one I want to rewrite?
What is a realistic theme or word for this month, and what would it look like in my daily life?
If this month gets chaotic, what habit do I want to protect at all costs?
A month from now, what small progress would make me genuinely proud, even if nobody else sees it?
month_end: What were three peaks and three valleys from this month, and what did each teach me?
Which choices this month moved me closer to the person I want to become?
What is one situation I handled better this month than I would have a year ago?
What am I grieving or disappointed about from this month, and how can I validate that without letting it define me?
What am I most grateful to past me for, across this month?
season_spring: Where do I notice signs of "newness" or change in my life right now, even if they are tiny?
If I treated this season as a fresh start, what is one outdated belief I would like to gently retire?
What small risk or experiment feels exciting in this season of my life?
How can I invite a little more play or curiosity into the next few weeks?
What inner part of me feels ready to grow, even if the rest of me feels hesitant?
season_summer: Where in my life do I feel most alive and energized right now, and how can I lean 10 percent more into that?
If I gave myself permission to enjoy something without earning it first, what would I do this week?
What boundaries around time, rest, or social media would let this season feel more spacious?
What is one moment of joy or beauty from recently that I want to replay in detail?
When I imagine looking back on this season years from now, what do I hope I will remember about myself?
